snippet: A wave of arson attacks spread across eastern Queens, and the police said the firebombings were being investigated as bias crimes — with Muslims as the targets.
abstract: Police are investigating wave of arson attacks involving homemade firebombs that occurred in Queens on Jan 1 as possible bias crimes, with Muslims as the targets.
lead_paragraph: A wave of arson attacks spread across eastern Queens, and the police said the firebombings were being investigated as bias crimes — with Muslims as the targets.

headline.seo: Four Attacks in Queens With Homemade Firebombs
headline.main: Four Attacks in Queens With Homemade Firebombs
headline.print_headline: Four Attacks in Queens With Homemade Firebombs
